mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT(USER_ID, PASSWD, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, EMAIL_YN, PHONE, SMS_YN) VALUES(#{userId}, #{passwd}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{emailYn}, #{phone}, #{smsYn})
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT SET ACCOUNT.PASSWD = #{passwd}, ACCOUNT.USER_NAME = #{userName}, ACCOUNT.USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, ACCOUNT.EMAIL_YN = #{emailYn}, ACCOUNT.SMS_YN = #{smsYn}, ACCOUNT.PHONE = #{phone} WHERE ACCOUNT.USER_ID = #{userId}
